description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal as it uses user-supplied input to construct file paths without proper validation or sanitization. This could allow an attacker to access, modify, or delete files outside of the intended directory. It is also vulnerable to SQL Injection and Cross-site Scripting as it does not properly sanitize user input before using it in SQL queries or outputting it to the browser, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands or inject malicious scripts.
